work_orders.title: Implement Work Order Indexing System for 8090 Integrations
work_orders.description:
Implement a comprehensive work order indexing system that can discover, 
            index, and manage work orders from the Factory.8090.ai service. This includes:
            
            1. Work order discovery from 8090 integrations using browser automation
            2. Full-text search capabilities across work order titles, descriptions, and tags
            3. Status and priority filtering (queued, in_progress, completed, etc.)
            4. Command-line interface for work order management
            5. Export/import functionality for data portability
            6. Real-time statistics and monitoring
            7. Comprehensive error handling and logging
            
            Technical Requirements:
            - Use Playwright for browser automation
            - Implement structured logging with structlog
            - Support multiple work order statuses and priorities
            - Provide RESTful API-like interface for work order operations
            - Include comprehensive test coverage
            - Follow security best practices for credential management

work_orders.title: Fix authentication bug in login system
work_orders.description: Users are unable to log in with special characters in passwords. Need to fix regex validation.

work_orders.title: Implement new dashboard feature
work_orders.description: Add a new analytics dashboard for user metrics and system performance monitoring.

work_orders.title: Update API documentation
work_orders.description: Update API documentation for new endpoints and add examples for all methods.

work_orders.title: Database optimization
work_orders.description: Optimize database queries and add proper indexing for better performance.

work_orders.title: Implement user notification system
work_orders.description: Create a comprehensive notification system for work order updates, status changes, and deadline reminders.

work_orders.title: Security audit and vulnerability assessment
work_orders.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit of the system and address any identified vulnerabilities.
